name: Midship
title: midship.ai
shortDescription: Midship revolutionizes audit procedures with AI technology, targeting auditors and accounting firms. By automating document sorting and categorization, Midship prepares audit samples quickly, ensuring compliance and accuracy. Users can review AI findings linked to evidence, making audits more efficient. An example use case is during busy audit seasons, where Midship's tools reduce manual workload and streamline audit processes.
pros: Integrates with Excel for enhanced functionality
cons: May require training to maximize benefits

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: AuditBoard
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Comprehensive audit suite with AI features
